sourcesContent:
// src/components/iceland-trip/weatherWidget.js import React from 'react'; import { CloudSnow, Wind, Droplets, Thermometer } from 'lucide-react'; const WeatherWidget = ({ weather, weatherForecast, theme }) => { return (

冰島天氣

{weather ? (
{weather.temperature}°C
{weather.condition}
{weather.windSpeed} km/h
{weather.humidity}%
體感 {weather.feelsLike}°C
{weatherForecast.map((day, index) => (
{day.day}
{day.temp}°
{day.condition}
))}
) : (
載入天氣資訊中...
)}
資料來源: OpenWeatherMap
); }; export default WeatherWidget;
